thread.title: Dwyane Wade And Gabrielle Union Teamed Up To Take Down A Critical Reporter On Twitter
thread.title_full: Dwyane Wade And Gabrielle Union Teamed Up To Take Down A Critical Reporter On Twitter

author: Bill DiFilippo
title: Dwyane Wade And Gabrielle Union Teamed Up To Take Down A Critical Reporter On Twitter
text:
Getty Image
Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union have more fun on social media than any other NBA couple. The best example of this happened when Union proclaimed that Jimmy Butler was crossed off of the familyâ€™s BBQ list due to Butlerâ€™s antics on the bench during a Bulls game. Union has also shown that sheâ€™s not afraid to get on her husbandâ€™s case when heâ€™s not getting the job done on the court â€“ she once called Wade out for not doing what he needed to do to secure a rebound during a game.
The pair decided to get some laughs at the expense of a reporter on Sunday. Frank Isola of the New York Daily News made a comment about Wade getting the benefit of the doubt from officials after he benefitted from a controversial call late in Chicagoâ€™s win against Sacramento.
Dwayne Wade leads a charmed life & I'm not even referring to Gabby Union. How many guys can come up short on a dunk & get bailed out by refs
â€” Frank Isola (@FisolaNYDN) January 22, 2017 

Sure, Isola had a point while discussing the foul at the end of the game, but this was still a pretty weird tweet. Shortly after, Wade responded by correcting Isolaâ€™s spelling of his name (which Wade probably has to do with someone on a daily basis). Additionally, he quoted The Big Lebowski , because why not?

It's Dwyane & sometimes you eat the bear and sometimes the bear eats you. https://t.co/mK4tcuKt5o 
â€” DWade (@DwyaneWade) January 22, 2017 

Isola tried to respond , but no one really noticed, because Union got in on the fun.
Soooâ€¦ I'm the Bear ðŸ¤— #Gab https://t.co/BetJrg5qXG 
â€” Gabrielle Union (@itsgabrielleu) January 22, 2017 

Never stop going in, Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union. Yâ€™all the best.
